title: WhatsApp Notification sound just keeps playing on the loop
content:
I had this phone now for two weeks and it has caused me so much headache.

When ever I get a WhatsApp notificatiin, the notification sound goes off in a loop the same melody(tried changing it/still the same song),wherever it's on dont distribute or loud.

It only stops when I restart the phone until the next message pops up. Turning the volume down helps till you forgot you did it and want to watch a video.

Hope someone can help me from this nightmare.
